description:
Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Cricbuzz - Experience cricket like never before with World’s no.1 Cricket app. Get extensive coverage of all International cricket, ICC World Cup, IPL, BBL, CPL, PSL, T20 Blast, domestic cricket and hundreds of cricket tournaments across the world.

* Fast Scores & Commentary: Stay updated with super-fast scores and immersive ball-by-ball commentary.
* Live Streaming of IPL, World Cup & More: Enjoy live streaming of IPL, World Cup, India and Australia Home Series, BBL, PSL, and other international cricket matches for an immersive viewing experience. [Available in select countries only. Not available in India]
* Live Match Notifications: Never miss a moment with live match alerts and breaking news.
* Latest News & Editorials: Stay informed with the latest updates and insightful editorials.
* Exclusive Premium Content: Get access to premium editorials and original video content with a subscription
* Upcoming Match Schedules: Plan your viewing effortlessly with upcoming match schedules.
* Rankings, Stats & Records: Explore cricket's intricacies with comprehensive data at your fingertips.
* Special content for major tournaments like ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, IPL, Champions Trophy, WPL etc.,

Whether you are a seasoned follower of the game or a new fan Cricbuzz app has you covered.

With over 20M active users and more than 2K competitions worldwide, you’ll have everything at your fingertips: live minute-by-minute match updates, personalised notifications for your favourite competitions, teams, and players, detailed stats, goals and the latest football news on transfers and the football market.

Don't miss a single match of the Premier League 2025/26 and UEFA Champions League seasons. Get all the live score, goals, stats, and news in our football app.

>> WITH BESOCCER: FOOTBALL LIVE SCORE
• Check today’s match schedules and football results.
• Find out where to watch the matches live.
• Stay connected with direct notifications for the latest news, standout players, teams, and transfer market updates.
• Share your opinions live during matches and on the latest news with our active user community.
• Live analysis and predictions of match results.
• Detailed statistics of each player, team or competition. 
• Images and video summaries of matches, teams or your favourite players.
• Navigate a simple, user-friendly interface with a sleek design.
• New audio commentaries on live matches.

>> CHECK LIVE SCORES, STATS & STANDINGS
Follow football from all over the world, including men’s and women’s competitions:
- Premier League, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and other top leagues.
- UEFA Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, Carabao Cup.
- Intercontinental Cup, UEFA Nations League, and many more!

>> ALL THE LATEST FOOTBALL AND TRANSFER MARKET NEWS
Check out all the latest football news and stay up to date on every move:
- Follow confirmed signings and transfer rumours.
- Discover which players are on the radar of Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern, PSG and other top European clubs.
- Find out which stars Liverpool, Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Manchester City are targeting.

>> FULL FOOTBALL FIXTURE SCHEDULES
Get match times for today’s games and upcoming key fixtures. Check past and future matchdays, where to watch the matches live, and stay updated with the latest news.

>>PROBABLES LINEUPS
See all the probables and confirmed lineups for the match live, along with each player´s performance and ratings.

>> SEARCH EVERYTHING YOU NEED INSTANTLY
Use our powerful search engine to find all the data you need on players, teams, and competitions:
- Who has scored more goals: Haaland or Mbappé?
- Who has won more titles: Messi or Cristiano?
- How many goals has Harry Kane scored?
- Which teams have the most league titles? Man City, Man United or Liverpool?
- Who won the last Ballon d’Or?

>> CUSTOMISE THE APP YOUR WAY
Set up the app to match your preferences and receive live notifications for your favourite teams, players, and competitions:
- Live match goals, results, and standings.
- Probable and confirmed line-ups.
- News, signings, and transfer rumours.

----------
Your feedback helps us improve every day!
We constantly enhance the app based on user suggestions and comments.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Please note: SportyTV is not a betting app.

beIN SPORTS is the ultimate destination for sports fans — bringing you the latest news, videos, highlights, live scores, standings, and expert analysis on the teams, leagues, and stars you love.



What makes us different?

- At a glance: Our news & results widget keeps the top stories and live scores just one tap away.

THE ENTIRE HUNT IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND  
The SPYPOINT app allows you to receive high-quality photos and videos from your SPYPOINT cellular trail camera directly to your smartphone or tablet. It also provides a simple and easy way to:  
• Activate new cameras  
• Save photos and videos 
• View customizable maps and weather information  
• Check the status of your cameras, including signal strength, battery level and storage space  
• Manage multiple cameras 
• Share camera feeds with other users
• Change camera settings or update firmware remotely*  
• Set and control notifications  
• Request on-demand photos or video from cameras with Instant Mode* 
• Quickly sort and filter photos using species tags that are automatically applied with BUCK TRACKER™ AI technology.  

*FLEX series only, refer to model specifications for more details.

A TRANSMISSION PLAN FOR EVERYONE 

Each camera requires a transmission plan to receive images from the field. SPYPOINT provides a FREE transmission plan option of 100 photos per month, per camera. To receive more photos or videos, upgrade your transmission plan.  

THE SPYPOINT INSIDERS CLUB  

If you take next-level scouting seriously, sign up for the SPYPOINT Insiders Club and enjoy an array of benefits such as: 
• A FREE basic transmission plan (250 photos per month)  
• 20% off photo transmission plans 
• 20% off all accessories  
• 50 FREE full-HD photos per year 
• 20% off full-HD photo and video packages  
• FULL ACCESS to all eight BUCK TRACKER™ AI species filters
• Camera sharing to your feed of photos and videos  
• 500 photos or videos to save in your own favorites filter 
• 12 months of transmitted photo and video history 
• Monthly giveaways of special SPYPOINT bundles and other hunting equipment 
• A dedicated support team to expedite service calls

PrediKick is your all-in-one AI-powered football prediction app designed for fans who want smarter and more accurate insights before every match. With advanced analytics and global coverage, PrediKick delivers high-quality predictions including 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores across major football leagues.

HOW IT WORKS
PrediKick analyzes real-time team form, player statistics, injuries, tactics, weather conditions, and historical match data. Our AI model processes millions of data points to deliver accurate predictions such as 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores. Users can unlock premium analytics using coins or upgrade with a subscription for full access. PrediKick ensures that every prediction type, including 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores, is updated frequently for maximum accuracy.

WHY IT’S IMPORTANT
Football fans need reliable, data-driven insights instead of random guessing. PrediKick helps users understand match outcomes with deep analytics powered by AI. You get clear predictions like 1X2 Tip probability, Over 2.5 goal chances, and Correct Scores expectations. With PrediKick, users make smarter decisions, understand team strengths, identify trends, and enjoy football with more confidence. Every match review includes expert-level analysis across 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores predictions.

KEY FEATURES
• AI-powered match predictions
• Accurate 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores
• Real-time team and player performance data
• Injury, suspension, and lineup monitoring
• Live odds movement tracking
• Confidence rating for each prediction
• Coin system to unlock premium insights
• Subscription that unlocks all premium predictions
• Historical accuracy tracking
• Smart notifications for matches and predictions
• Multilingual support for global users
• Clean and fast Material Design interface
• Light and dark mode options
• Frequent data updates across top leagues
• Safe and privacy-focused system

IMPORTANCE OF PREDICTION TYPES
PrediKick specializes in the three most-used prediction markets:
• 1X2 Tip gives clear win-draw-win expectations backed by data. PrediKick enhances this with advanced AI.
• Over 2.5 helps users measure scoring probability using real-time and historical metrics. PrediKick updates this dynamically.
• Correct Scores provides detailed final-score possibilities using advanced statistical modeling. PrediKick delivers high-confidence outputs.
These prediction types — 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores — are available throughout the app, ensuring users always get the most important insights for each match.

PERFECT FOR
• Fans looking for 1X2 Tip and Over 2.5 predictions
• Users who want accurate Correct Scores
• Football enthusiasts worldwide
• Fantasy football players
• Sports analysts
• Match prediction hobbyists
• Anyone who wants smarter football insights using PrediKick

COINS & UNLOCKS
PrediKick allows users to earn coins daily, complete tasks, or watch rewarded videos to unlock premium insights. Coins can open access to predictions such as 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores. No real money required for coin-based unlocks.

SUBSCRIPTION
PrediKick Premium unlocks everything instantly — all advanced analytics, all prediction types, and all premium content including detailed 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores predictions.
Monthly: $9.99
Yearly: $59.99
Auto-renews unless cancelled.
Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://www.e-droid.net/privacy.php?ida=1348541&idl=en

DOWNLOAD PREDIKICK TODAY
Join thousands of users who trust PrediKick for smart, accurate, and AI-driven football insights including 1X2 Tip, Over 2.5, and Correct Scores predictions for leagues around the world.

DISCLAIMER
PrediKick is for entertainment and informational purposes only. It does not offer or support real-money betting. Users must be 18+ and comply with local laws. Responsible use is encouraged.

developer: OLE FOR SPORTS PLAYGROUNDS RENTAL AND MANAGEMENT L.L.C
description:
Are you on the lookout for a quick and effortless way to share your dream football team lineup with friends, or are you a true football aficionado with aspirations of crafting the perfect lineup. Introducing the premier destination for football enthusiasts in the UAE - Ole, The No.1 Stadium Management and Booking App. Elevate your football experience to new heights with a comprehensive suite of features designed to cater to players, teams, and fans alike. With Ole best line up app, booking your ideal football or padel playground in the UAE is a breeze. Gone are the days of frustrating back-and-forths with field owners. Our app provides instant confirmation, putting you in control of your game schedule and freeing up your valuable time.

Need a quick and easy way to show your friends your ideal football team line-up or you just want to imagine a dream football team? We delve deep into the world of crafting the perfect lineup. Our goal is to equip you with an in-depth understanding of OLE's lineup creation features, empowering you to make strategic choices that maximize your team's potential. Get ready to unlock the full potential of your team with OLE. It's time to create lineups that lead to victory, and we're here to show you how.

What truly sets Ole apart is its unwavering commitment to affordability. We understand that enjoying the beautiful game shouldn't come with a hefty price tag. That's why we offer some of the most competitive ground booking prices in the region, making sure that football remains accessible to everyone. But Ole book venue is not just about securing a pitch; it's about fostering a vibrant football community. You can effortlessly create and manage matches, allowing you to challenge other teams and bask in the thrill of competition. Picture yourself on the field, facing formidable opponents, and emerging victorious - Ole makes that dream a reality.

For those who relish a challenge, our lineup app enables you to initiate exciting match-ups with other teams, sparking friendly rivalries that keep the adrenaline pumping. And if you prefer a more private setting, Ole lets you extend exclusive invitations to select teams, ensuring that every match is tailored to your preferences. Fairness is paramount in football, and Ole
understands that better than anyone. That's why we've made it easy to invite experienced referees from within the app to officiate your matches, guaranteeing that every game unfolds with integrity and professionalism. Ole football app is your gateway to football freedom. Whether you're an avid player looking to book a pitch for days on end or someone new to the sport seeking an exciting experience, our app accommodates your needs. We're here to fuel your passion for football, whatever your level of expertise.

In summary, Ole - The No.1 Stadium Management and Booking App - redefines the way you engage with football in the UAE. With instant confirmations, unbeatable prices, and a rich set of features that enhance your football journey, there's no better companion for enthusiasts, teams, and players. Don't settle for less when you can create lineups that inspire victory. The world of football awaits your strategic brilliance. Are you ready to elevate your game? Look no further – OLE is your key to tactical excellence and lineup mastery. Download OLE: Turf Booking app now and start building lineups that lead to unforgettable victories! It's time to play, compete, and win like never before and write your name in football history.


Please visit our website

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
